sub_title: Geophysical Reporting Line Manager at Fugro
summary:
Marine Geologist with 20 years of international experience in the field of Marine Site Characterization (MSC). Caring, supportive, strong listener with excellent intercultural communication skills. Problem solver and critical thinker developed during an extensive academic and professional career.

Highly experienced in data analysis and integration of a variety of marine data types (e.g. subsurface data - 2D/3D UHRS/SBP, geophysical surface data - sidescan sonar, magnetometer, geotechnics) focusing on Offshore Wind Farm Energy market, Sub-sea Cable industries and land reclamation projects (artificial nourishments).

Open minded servant leader overseeing a large team of more than 50 technical specialists.
